content: it s so easy to make this trio of colorful crochet baskets with our cushy bernat blanket o go you ll practice single_crochet while working in the round in a spiral technique to help avoid any unsightly seams on these petite hanging baskets you ll only use one o go which includes the 3 perfectly curated colors needed for this project with a seamless hanging handle plus a neat folded rim these baskets are ideally sized to catch notions or display your favorite plants you ll love customizing this pattern using any o go colors that liven up your space yarn for model bernat® blanket™ o go™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m art nouveau 42022 1 o go note 1 o go will make 3 baskets
